A first name is required. Please check. A last name is required. Please check. An email address is required. Please check. Email address invalid. Please check. Device already registered. "Silent Circle provides an encrypted app that lets you and only you access your contacts and call log. \nSilent Contacts is a free add-on from Silent Circle. \nFor more information, go to our website. \nInstall Silent Contacts" Add Security
Dial
backspace Open contacts Display recent calls "You should verbally compare the authentication code with the person you are calling. If it doesn’t match, it indicates that someone may have intercepted the call." Connection Error. Please close and call again. The person you are calling needs to update their Silent Phone application to the latest version. Application Error. Please re-install Silent Phone.
Read secure contacts Write secure contacts
Read access to Silent Circle key manager Write access to Silent Circle key manager

Step 1 of 3 Step 2 of 3 Step 3 of 3 An alternate email address is necessary to receive important updates and benefits regarding your account. As a Vertu Customer you enjoy 12 months of complimentary access to Silent Circle’s encrypted communications services. Toggle mute audio Switch cameras

If you are resetting your phone, simply log into your Silent Circle account normally. If you are having trouble activating your Blackphone and Silent Circle accounts, please contact customer support at support@blackphone.ch

"You don't have any contacts to display. (If you just added an account, it can take a few minutes to sync contacts.)\n\nTo add contacts, touch Menu, then touch:\n \n
Accounts to add or set up an account with contacts you can sync to the phone\n \n
Display options to change which contacts are visible\n \n
New contact to create a new contact from scratch\n \n
Import/Export to import contacts from your SIM or SD card\n"

Silent Circle Contacts is a companion application that stores your contacts in an encrypted database. \n\nBuild number: %1$s (%2$s)
Cannot open key store. The password or PIN you entered is incorrect, please try again. Cannot create key store. Enter Password Enter old password Enter new password Enter password (verify) Change password Password change failed. Using existing password. Old password is wrong. Locking key store. Unlock Lock Create key store Change password Unlocked Locked Backup key data Backup storage not accessible. Restore key data Cannot create backup file. Backup of key manager data failed. Backup of key manager data complete. Restore of key manager data failed. Restoring of key manager data complete. No backup file for restore available. Missing password. Information Show password Passwords do not match. Please check. Registered applications
Tap on screen to toggle video control buttons. \n\nTouch small preview window to move it. Cannot run Silent Contacts Check the status of the Silent Contacts application and enable if it is disabled. Without access to Silent Contacts Silent Phone cannot access contact information.
Start Silent Phone on boot Start Silent Phone during the device\'s startup procedure.
Enable Firewall traversal If Silent Phone detects a restrictive firewall it uses special connection settings.
Force Firewall traversal Use a more reliable but lower-quality method of connecting the call audio, which may be needed on particularly bad networks.
Ask to secure other calls Silent Phone will ask whether you would like to secure calls placed from outside of Silent Phone.
Dropout tone Plays low tone if no media packets are arriving from network. Indicates slow network.
Echo canceler Automatic control of echo canceler. If not selected the echo canceler is always active
Dial assist To simplify dialing, turn on Dial Assist and select a country. The number will automatically be formatted with your country code. Otherwise, dial \'+\' and the country code. To call other Silent Circle subscribers, simply dial their Silent Circle subscriber name. Select your country No dial assist Simple dial assist
Dial assist disabled. Adds \'+\' to form an international phone number. Adds \'+\' or \'+1\' or replaces a leading \'011\' with a \'+\' sign. Replaces a leading \'%1$s\' with country code %2$s and a leading \'%3$s\' with the \'+\' sign. Adds \'%2$s\' to dialed digits and replaces a leading \'%3$s\' with the \'+\' sign.
Enter an own password to enhance key store protection.\nYou need to enter this password every time you start Silent Phone. You can reset to default protection at any time.
Change your own key store password. The client resets key store protection to default after you entered your password. Enter your key store password.
Enter an own PIN to enhance key store protection.\nYou need to enter this PIN every time you start Silent Phone. You can reset to default protection at any time.
Change your own key store PIN. The client resets key store protection to default after you entered your PIN. Enter your key store PIN.

Silent Phone re-provision Reload Silent Phone configuration data
Silent Contacts is now embedded into Silent Phone. This migration step copies your existing Silent Contacts and deletes the old Silent Key Manager and Silent Contacts applications.
After completion of data copying accept de-installation of existing old Silent Contacts app.
Start migration of Silent Contact data. Export existing Silent Contacts. Migration done. Import into embedded Silent Contacts. Embedded contact provider not ready. "Contact data migration: KeyManager request failed."
